title: Maanelander
description: Maanelander was a game I made in 48 hours for my exam in the subject Information Technology 2 in highschool. The task was to make a 'replica' of the famous game Lunar Lander.

title: Meteor Shower
description: Meteor Shower is a small experimental project where I wanted to create a game where you would destory meteors. I was inspired by Asteroids, the arcade space shooter from the 80-ies.

title: Kommando Kompe
description: Kommando Kompe was the first game I ever made. Me and my friend created this game during High School as an assignment. It is rather simple, due to the fact that the entire game engine was built as a part of this project. Hence no external libraries at all.
